name: deimosrising
text: This strip is in fact too awesome for many people, which explains its relatively low rating.

name: expellens
text: I originally gave it a 3. But it was so awesome that I came back months later to give it the 4 it so richly deserves!

name: maldraedior
text: strips with Todd are automatically 5s

name: billyamericana
text: Never did understand why Archie had a huge goose-egg on the back of his head. Maybe from all the underground street fighting?

name: mortshire
text: the side of his hair looks either like it's been scuffed or woven 'pon a loom.

name: ambala
text: reminds me of Cindy Lauper's 80's haircut.

name: straw
text: ..aren't 80's movies so funny?  It's like... ha ha!  The hair! They're so funny!

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Yeah, except Rain Man.

name: ssddr
text: What about the scene where the dumb guy doesnt want to get on the plane

name: godfatherofsouls
text: no your thinking the big black guy

name: natashamarie
text: A comment left by natashamarie was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, Jesler729, godfatherofsouls)

name: godfatherofsouls
text: yeah mr t wasnt in rain man iether

name: hbaranov
text: But. If He was. Think on it.

name: tekende
text: What the hell happened here. You guys are nuts.

name: em2
text:
Five minutes to Judge Wapner.

Foo'!

name: nigelchaos
text: He wasn't in it. He was standing on it.

name: chaesar
text: No Teodor, you can NEVER be too awesome.

name: a_dude
text: impossible to be too awesome.

name: spectre
text: Er, has Todd ever HAD a girlfriend? What does he know about women?

name: son_of_selleck
text: todd has never had a girlfriend per se, but has dedicated his existence to getting mad rutty.

name: cailetshadow
text: a noble endeavor

name: vice
text: Don't forget getting fresh with the fine women

name: relaxing
text: I think so

name: chachibenji
text: Also his extensive hip service at night school.

name: mattylite
text: I love how hard he has to think about that last question... eyebrows all furrowed, hand on chin like the damned Rodin sculpture...

name: hbaranov
text: He doesn't remind me of The Thinker . He just looks like he is scratching his chin.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I gotta agree.  Comparing that pose to Rodin is a little overwrought.  It's like saying I look like as timeless and discerning as Lincoln at his memorial just because I'm sitting in a chair

name: mattylite
text: Ya, I guess not literally like the Thinker, just that he is thinking really hard, and it is a hilarious question to be thinking that hard about.

name: lux
text: chubbies for culture

name: babeeazz
text: archie hair does drive the chicks wild.  especially super-fine chicks that the only distinguishing feature between one being superpopular and the other being a tomboy bumpkin is their hair color.  archie comics were all about one's personality defined by the length, style, and color of one's follicles.

name: cobra_lionfist
text:
The final line of this seals it as one of the greatest, underrated,
achewoods.

name: jhunter
text:
he looks more angry than bemused in that last panel, as if he's shot himself in the foot by being too awesome.
"godDAMMIT Teodor, you've done it again! now put on these too-tight yellow lycra shorts and don't wash your hair for four days, it is time to do Penance."
